name: Baldi's Basics in Funkin' Definitive Edition
name_original: Baldi's Basics in Funkin' Definitive Edition
description:
Baldi's Basics in Funkin' Definitive Edition is a game developed by sapenation67890. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Baldi's Basics in Funkin' Definitive Edition on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
